sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM) — In the last year alone, an average of 14 Pennsylvanians died a day from an overdose, according to Attorney General Josh Shapiro.
author: Lauren Rude
title: All Pa. counties sign on to $26 billion global opioid settlement

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who was attending Monday’s event at the White House, applauded the move and pointed to a serious uptick in ghost guns being found by police.
author: Associated Press
title: Biden aims at 'ghost gun' violence with new federal rule
